Package com.iontrading.mkv

Interface MkvSubscriptionRequestListener

  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public interface MkvSubscriptionRequestListener
    When creating a Recordset on publisher side, an optional MkvSubscriptionRequestListener object can be provided to programmatically react to record subscription requests matching the Recordset.

    For each incoming record subscription, the onSubscriptionRequest(MkvRecordset, MkvSubscriptionRequest) method will be invoked, with an MkvSubscriptionRequest object, wrapping all the required information for the subscription request in hand.

    Using the MkvSubscriptionRequest object, the publisher business logic can decide whether to accept or reject the subscription request, based on:

    • the subscriber component name or the corresponding user name
    • the specific record name being requested
    • the set of fields being requested
    • any entitlement mechanism enforced on the specific record, the user or the field value content

    To accept a request, the publisher code shall invoke the MkvRecordset.acceptSubscription(MkvSubscriptionRequest, MkvSupply) method, anytime and from any thread the business logic desire.

    To refuse a request, the publisher code shall invoke the MkvRecordset.rejectSubscription(MkvSubscriptionRequest, String) method, anytime and from any thread the business logic desire.

    See Also:
    MkvObject, MkvRecordListener, MkvSupply, MkvSupplyFactory, MkvLifeCycleListener, MkvSubscriptionRequestListener, MkvSubscriptionRequest

      void onSubscriptionRequest​(MkvRecordset recordset, MkvSubscriptionRequest request)
      For each incoming record subscription, the onSubscriptionRequest(MkvRecordset, MkvSubscriptionRequest) method will be invoked, with an MkvSubscriptionRequest object, wrapping all the required information for the subscription request in hand.

    • Method Detail

      • onSubscriptionRequest

        void onSubscriptionRequest​(MkvRecordset recordset,
                           MkvSubscriptionRequest request)
        For each incoming record subscription, the onSubscriptionRequest(MkvRecordset, MkvSubscriptionRequest) method will be invoked, with an MkvSubscriptionRequest object, wrapping all the required information for the subscription request in hand.

        The publisher can accept or reject the subscription request either synchronously (i.e.: within the scope of this call) or asynchronously (i.e.: caching the request parameter and using it later on)

        Parameters:
        recordset - the Recordset for the subscription request in hand
        request - the object wrapping all the required information for the subscription request in hand
